outputs.output_descr: The purpose of this project is to support the Ministry of Investment to battle corruption and mismanagement of public resources aiming at improving its relations with private sector and foreign investors. The project will: a) support the drafting and issuing of the legal document on freedom of information; b)Raise public awareness and stakeholder engagement; c)Enhance capacity building and knowledge management; d)Promote investment through enhancing transparency.

project_title: Support MOI in Enhancing Transparency & Fight Corruption
